name: Sonic Boss Rush Plus
description:
(This project was originally uploaded to Scratch)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I did not create any sprites in this project.

All coding was done by me.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is Sonic Boss Rush Plus, as the name implies, it is a boss rush. There are back to back boss fights, once you defeat one person, a harder foe attacks. There are several bosses, each with slightly different attacks and varying difficulties. Can you survive until the end?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

-Single Player-

The player starts with 10 rings.

Arrow Keys to move

Z key to jump

-Multiplayer-

Both players share rings and start with 10 rings.

Player 1:

A and D to move

W to jump

Player 2:

Left and Right Arrow keys to move

Up Arrow to jump
